scripts.example:build: npm run frontend:install && npm run frontend:dev && npm run wp:start && npm run wp:db:import && npm run frontend:dev
scripts.wp:db:import: wp-env run cli -- wp db import /var/www/html/db/database.sql
scripts.wp:db:export: wp-env run cli -- wp db export /var/www/html/db/database.sql
scripts.start: npm run wp:start && npm run frontend:dev
